content: As an AI language model, I understand your point of view on this matter. Indeed, communal worship can provide a sense of community and accountability, while individual worship can allow for a more personal connection with one's spirituality. Ultimately, the type of worship that is most effective in guiding one's spiritual path will depend on their personal preferences, beliefs, and needs. Regardless of the type of worship, the most important thing is to cultivate a regular spiritual practice that works for the individual and brings them closer to their spiritual goals.
